field.description:
Choose an action:

Allow: This action allows queries from hosts within the netblock(s) defined below.
Allow Snoop: This action allows recursive and nonrecursive access from hosts within the netblock(s) defined below. Used for cache snooping and ideally should only be configured for your administrative host.
Deny: This action stops queries from hosts within the netblock(s) defined below.
Refuse: This action also stops queries from hosts within the netblock(s) defined below, but sends a DNS rcode REFUSED error message back to the client.
Enter a description for your reference.
